buffs.name: Blessing of Light
buffs.description: Places a Blessing on the friendly target, increasing the effects of Holy Light spells used on the target by up to ${holyLight} and the effect Flash of Light spells used on the target by up to ${flashOfLight}. Lasts 5 min. Players may only have one Blessing on them per Paladin at any one time.

buffs.name: Divine Illumination
buffs.description: Reduces the mana cost of all spells by ${reduction}% for ${seconds} sec.
